titleStmt.title: Police d'un chargement à destination de Monsieur Roussié de Collioure

publicationStmt.p: Encoded by Fantin Le Ber, as part of his final assignement for his M2 TNAH XML class

history.p: The 3B16-1 folder of the AD66 contains the archives collected at the Amiralty of Collioure about the sinking of the tartane St Jean St Vincent in January 1740. For that reason all the "polices de chargement", and documents contained in that folder are signed by the Amiralty authorities, i.e. the Sieur Balanda-Sicart, "contrôleur général" of the admiralty

physDesc.p: The source is a police de chargement, on which are mentionned the conditions through which some goods will be transported from Marseille to Collioure
